text: Alan Curtis (30 July 1930 â€“ 18 February 2021) was an English actor and cricket announcer. He was born in Coulsdon, Surrey, England. His career lasted from 1956 until 2003. He appeared as Major Green in some Doctor Who episodes during the 1960s. Curtis died on 18 February 2021 in London at the age of 90. ==Movies== * Ladies Who Do (1963) * Tomorrow at Ten (1965) * Agente Logan - missione Ypotron (1966) * Carry On Henry (1971) * Die Screaming, Marianne (1971) * Four Dimensions of Greta (1972) * The Flesh and Blood Show (1972) * Carry On Abroad (1972) * Tiffany Jones (1973) * Professor Popper's Problem (1974) * The Vision (1988) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from London Category:Actors from Surrey
title: Alan Curtis (British actor)
